page.title: 03CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: I live in Rushenden. You can play football in the playing field. It's like Queenborough playing field. They've got some good hiding places. It's brilliant for playing {Hide-and-Seek}and{40-40}and{Manhunt and{He. 40-40 is a game like Hide-and-Seek. Somebody counts up to 50 and the others go and hide. There's a post called Cat's Post, and after the person has counted he goes to look for the others. If he ses one of them he's got to run to the Cat's Post and say '40-40 shot you'. Then that person is He for the next game. But if a person can get to Cat's Post and say '40-40 shot myself' then he isn't He.
